Class CsvOutputGenerator

java.lang.Object
  ch.ethz.vizzly.CsvOutputGenerator

public class CsvOutputGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

This class generates the CSV outputs that are then sent to a client.

Author:
Matthias Keller
